welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lurate Caccivio! This charming city is known for its picturesque streets, delicious cuisine, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and savor all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network and completing a short registration process.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lugano Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lugano Airport caters to VIP and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Linate Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
